trans-unit.source: Represents an item (row) in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object represents an item (row) in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control, such as a heading section, a footer section, or a data row.

The data items of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control are stored in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItemCollection> collection that can be accessed by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
You can use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object to programmatically access the properties of an item in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> class.
Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> class.
The index of the item from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items"></xref> collection in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
The index number of the item, from the bound data source, that appears in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
Gets or sets the data item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.DataItem%2A> property to specify or determine the properties of a data item represented by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
A <xref href="System.Object"></xref> that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object from the bound data source.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.DataSetIndex%2A> property to get the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the bound data source.
This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the bound data source.

Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items"></xref> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemIndex%2A> property to determine the index of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items%2A> collection of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
This property applies only to data items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> object must be set to `ListItemType.Item`, `ListItemType.AlternatingItem`, `ListItemType.SelectedItem`, or `ListItemType.EditItem`.

The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items"></xref> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
Gets the type of the item represented by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem.ItemType%2A> property to determine the type of an item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
The following table lists the various item types.
Item Type
Description
The heading section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
The footer section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
An item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
An alternating item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
The selected item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
The item selected for editing in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
A separator between the items of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
The page selection section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> control.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
Used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> class.
The source of the event.
An <xref href="System.EventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
`true` if the event has been canceled; otherwise, `false`.
Used internally by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> class.
One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListItemType"></xref> values.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItem"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
An object that represents a data item in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DataItemIndex"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.
The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the bound data source.
For a description of this member, see <xref href="System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer.DisplayIndex"></xref>.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IDataItemContainer> interface.

The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridItem"></xref> from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid.Items"></xref> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid"></xref> control.
